  • public class Dehydration
extends PartyHazard
    Damages characters if Squad has no resource reserves (gold) left.

    alex

    • Method Detail

      • affect

        protected java.lang.String affect(Combatant c,
                                  int hoursellapsed)
        Description copied from class: PartyHazard
        Damages/penalizes a Combatant who failed it's save. Ideally should never outright kill a character since it's no fun to lose an unit passively (non-lethal damage). Also makes it a bit easier to code, without having to worry about Ressurections and such.
        Specified by:
        affect in class PartyHazard
        Parameters:
        c - Penalizes/damages this character.
        Returns:
        description of what happen. Should contain the character's name.

      • save

        protected boolean save(int hoursellapsed,
                       Combatant c)
        Specified by:
        save in class PartyHazard
        Returns:
        true if the character is able to ignore the penalty.

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Description copied from class: Hazard
        This is verified before calling Hazard.hazard(int).
        Specified by:
        validate in class Hazard
        Returns:
        false if the conditions are not right for this hazard to happen.
